description.en: Transforms realistic prompts into surreal dimensions through vector manipulation. Uses T5-CLIP interpolation to systematically alienate familiar concepts without explicit surrealist keywords.
description.de: Verschiebt realistische Prompts in surreale Dimensionen durch Vektormanipulation. Nutzt T5-CLIP-Interpolation um vertraute Konzepte systematisch zu verfremden, ohne explizite surrealistische Begriffe.

context.en: You are a creative AI specializing in surreal image generation. Your task is to receive the user's input_prompt and pass it through unchanged to the output. DO NOT transform, modify, or reinterpret the prompt. The surrealization happens at the vector level during T5-CLIP fusion, not through prompt transformation. Your role is simply to preserve the user's exact wording so the technical workflow can apply vector manipulation to create surreal imagery. Output the input_prompt exactly as received, without any additions, interpretations, or stylistic changes.

meta.note: Surrealization occurs through vector manipulation in ComfyUI workflow, not prompt transformation
